content.webTitle: Michael Tomasky: The national-security team considered

fields.headline: My most recent and really final (for now!) Hillary take
fields.bodyText: Here is my more considered, 850-word take on the press conference this morning, which is up on CIF and will be in the paper tomorrow. I'm warming to the HRC idea, let's just say. Also: New video coming on this subject soon! And a commitment to renewed video efforts in the future!
